document_data.mainbody:
Nesger was a spy for Belgon Bradaskor in the mid-14 century DR.
He referred to Belgon as Master.
Nesger hurriedly reported to Belgon Bradaskor in late , badly injured and weary beyond measure, regarding Orthil Voldovans caravan in which Shandril Shessair was traveling at the moment. He mentioned that there were entirely too many wizards, and that Shandrils spellfire was slaying them all, and torching the wagons too. He claimed hed back her against anyone, then staggered away without elaborating.
